79b2('bum): ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston
79b3('bum): to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya

79b5('bum): to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston
79b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byi stong pa nyid
79b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid phung po nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bas
80a1('bum): ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
80a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston
80a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dor
80a4('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
80a5('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben

80a7('bum): ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
80b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi
80b2('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba

80b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa

80b7('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar

88b3('bum): bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
88b4('bum): bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
88b5('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo
88b6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
88b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
89a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam
89a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma
89a3('bum): byab stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// thogam
89a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang
89a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi
89a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po
89a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med
89b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang
89b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dbang
89b3('bum): po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi
89b4('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden
89b5('bum): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig
89b6('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa
89b7('bum): brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
90a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
90a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi
90a3('bum): sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs
90a4('bum): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen
90a5('bum): po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
90a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
90a7('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa
90b1('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
90b2('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang
90b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
90b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po

90b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po

91a2('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo ba stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po
91a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i
91a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
91a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

91a7('bum): rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po mdo pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// su'i
91b1('bum): mam pAr zhes pa

92a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten

92a5('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//

92a7('bum): bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
92b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po med

93a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhis bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten

93b1('bum): dang ban[]/ da pa ya bstong ga/ sa/ dang da nga

94a7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu'i 'jig rten das pa mad pa'i gra mid spong ba zhes bya bar smon to// rnam par mang pa'i nastong pa nyid dang /
94b1('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo

95b6('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes

96a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
96a2('bum): bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
96a3('bum): bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
96a4('bum): bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
96a5('bum): chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nam
96a6('bum): mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
96a7('bum): to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten no zhes
96b1('bum): bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
96b2('bum): sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten
96b3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
96b4('bum): tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu byon pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
96b5('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
96b6('bum): bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
96b7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa
97a1('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa
97a2('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
97a3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams
97a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
97a5('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos
97a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong
97a7('bum): ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
97b1('bum): bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i
97b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi
97b3('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
97b4('bum): ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
97b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
97b6('bum): bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b7('bum): glengs bcu'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar smon to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gi zhes bya bar smon to// mas yong dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gi no/
98a1('bum): bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
98a2('bum): ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bor ston to//
98a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa
98a4('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
98a5('bum): to// rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
98a6('bum): pa skyed cing 'jig ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
98a7('bum): ston to// ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten
98b1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par
98b2('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
98b3('bum): sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
98b4('bum): yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
98b5('bum): dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// re'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos
98b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
98b7('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lha'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
99a1('bum): ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
99a2('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid nas bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
99a3('bum): ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
99a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus
99a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
99a6('bum): ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jog rten
99a7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
99b1('bum): gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten
99b2('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te
99b3('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i
99b4('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
99b5('bum): ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg pa'i
99b6('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// len
99b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100a1('bum): rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byi stong pa nyid
100a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa
100a6('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
100a7('bum): ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
100b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos thams cad
100b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa
100b4('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jin
100b5('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
100b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
100b7('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
101a1('bum): bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam
101a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi
101a3('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshod med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
101a4('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
101a5('bum): pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
101a6('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba
101a7('bum): ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
101b1('bum): to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar son to//
101b2('bum): byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong ba nyid ces bya bar ston to// snying rje chen pa'i 'jig rten stong ba nyid ces bya bar smon to// sangs rgyas kyi chos pa
101b3('bum): bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rted spyong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba ston to// lan cig phyir
101b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bul 'a ga den stong pa 'od ces byabar na/ bying mi 'ong ba'i 'bras rdu'i 'jig rten stong ba 'o ces bya bar gyun to//
101b5('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// la mo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
101b6('bum): 'jog rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar byon to// rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten spong ba nyid ces bya bar byan
101b7('bum): / bam po lnga pa'o// // rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab
102a1('bum): / kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing / 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
102a2('bum): mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar
102a3('bum): ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos
102a4('bum): de lta bu med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
102a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis
102a6('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//
102a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra
102b1('bum): 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam
102b2('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
102b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar
102b4('bum): gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegaso pa dgra
102b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi
102b6('bum): gtang ba'i don to// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
102b7('bum): kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
103a1('bum): sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
103a2('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i
103a3('bum): phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu
103a4('bum): bos bsdu ba la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag za
103a5('bum): nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
103a6('bum): rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin
103a7('bum): zhen/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzha' du med pa ste/ sus kyang
103b1('bum): gzhal bar mi nus so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
103b2('bum): kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa
103b3('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su yang med na/ lhag pa sa
103b4('bum): ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
103b5('bum): kyi don mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang
103b6('bum): 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
103b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / khams
104a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung
104a2('bum): nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med/ gzhal du med de/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/

121a7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/

121b2('bum): srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba
121b3('bum): bsam gyis khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis
121b4('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
121b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu

121b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzham du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
122a1('bum): du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa

130a7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi
130b1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
130b2('bum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
130b3('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// /
130b4('bum): rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po
130b5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa
130b6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yang dag
130b7('bum): par spong ba rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi
131a1('bum): rkang pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
131a2('bum): rab 'byor dbang po rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stobs
131a3('bum): rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
131a4('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

131b4('bum): dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
131b5('bum): med pa la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams
131b6('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'ang
131b7('bum): bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang bsam pa

132a3('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang / minyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang /

132a7('bum): pa dang / chud dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi migs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang /

132b2('bum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor

136a1('bum): sa kyis sa tshun pal bsem pa dang / dpan pa dang / dang / marnam par kyimanyam pa mi rigs pa lags/ ci'i mang du bzod pa

136b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang /

137a1('bum): bsags/ mang du nga gi ma nyid kyang ba nyid sa bsas pa dang / dpag pa dang / cha dang / mnyam pa dang mi marnam pa mi shegs pa lam
137a2('bum): ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
137a3('bum): ma bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngob nyid stong pa nyid la bsas pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang /

137a5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
137a6('bum): ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams sa bamam pa dang / dpag pa dang / cad dang / mnas pa dang se mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du du 'bral
137a7('bum): rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang /
137b1('bum): dpag pa dang / cad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i thad du stobs rnamam sa bams pa dang / dpag pa dang / cad dang / marnam pa dang mam
137b2('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan mag rnams la bsas pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i sra
137b3('bum): du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i
137b4('bum): bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang /
137b5('bum): dpag pa dang / mad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i mang du cang med pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang
137b6('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
137b7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
138a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi

138a4('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i

138a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa
138a7('bum): pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa
138b1('bum): dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam
138b2('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
138b3('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
138b4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
138b5('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
138b6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
138b7('bum): ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub
139a1('bum): sa bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / dang / mnyas par mem ma pa mi rigs pa lags/ du tshan
139a2('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang /
139a3('bum): dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
139a4('bum): mi khyag dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang
139a5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
139a6('bum): tshar ba la bsas pa dang / dpa' pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnos pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ra ba nyid bsas kyis me lhag
139a7('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang me mnyam
139b1('bum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du
139b2('bum): byed la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo na nyid bsam gyis me khyob/
139b3('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang me
139b4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig

147b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
147b4('bum): bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha me med pa stong po nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
147b5('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam
147b6('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
147b7('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa
148a1('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo zhing bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid
148a2('bum): la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/
148a3('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa
148a4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
148a5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
148a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa
148a7('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sesam gyis mi khyab/ dpas
148b1('bum): tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
148b2('bum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo
148b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
148b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang /
148b5('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med//
148b6('bum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang // dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi
148b7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
149a1('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
149a2('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
149a3('bum): phyir rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo
149a4('bum): nyid bsam gyi mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang /
149a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
149a6('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi
149a7('bum): yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
149b1('bum): bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rngam nyid bsam gyis
149b2('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang /
149b3('bum): tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
149b4('bum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang
149b5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
149b6('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chad med pa
149b7('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang /
150a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
150a2('bum): ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
150a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid
150a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang / dpag
150a5('bum): pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
150a6('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam
150a7('bum): ba dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
150b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
150b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshang dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
150b3('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
150b4('bum): de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams
150b5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang /
150b6('bum): tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/
150b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
151a1('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
151a2('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhir
151a3('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang /
151a4('bum): tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par bla bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi
151a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
151a6('bum): 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa
151a7('bum): dang / dpag pa dang / chang dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal
151b1('bum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
151b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas
151b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
151b4('bum): bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang /
151b5('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag
151b6('bum): tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa
151b7('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
152a1('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam partsi
152a2('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
152a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsas kyis mi khyam
152a4('bum): dpag tu the gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig go//
152a5('bum): rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lam gyi
152a6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
152a7('bum): jo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang /
152b1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
152b2('bum): / bam po bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
152b3('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa
152b4('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
152b5('bum): dang mnyam pa de la/ 'du shes dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/
152b6('bum): 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rnam par
152b7('bum): shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mig dmigs su yod dam/
153a1('bum): rna ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna gang/
153a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sna dmigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
153a3('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
153a4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lus dmigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/
153a5('bum): yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ gzugs dmigs su
153a6('bum): yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sgra dmigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis
153a7('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dri dmigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du/
153b1('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ ro dmigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
153b2('bum): mnyam pa de la/ reg dmigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ chos
153b3('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mig gi rnam
153b4('bum): par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/
153b5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
153b6('bum): mnyam pa de la/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
153b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du
154a1('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsan
154a2('bum): byis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg
154a3('bum): ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus
154a4('bum): te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/
154a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su
154a6('bum): yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
154a7('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lus kyi 'dus
154b1('bum): te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/
154b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/
154b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis
154b4('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i
154b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sna'i 'dus te reg
154b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/
154b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bas
155a1('bum): gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
155a2('bum): tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
155a3('bum): mnyam pa de la/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/
155a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnya
155a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la/ chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ me'i khams bla sam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
155a6('bum): dang mnyam pa de la/ mo'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bsam gyi mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mnyam pa
155a7('bum): dang mnyam pa de la/ rlung gi khams dmigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/
155b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med
155b2('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med
155b3('bum): ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
155b4('bum): ba dang mnyam pa de la/ 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
155b5('bum): mnyam pa de la/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ ming dang gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du mod pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
155b6('bum): dang mnyam pa de la/ ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
155b7('bum): pa de la/ skye mched drug dmigs su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/
156a1('bum): reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ tshor
156a2('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ sred pa dmigs su yod dam/ len
156a3('bum): ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ len pa dmigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis mi khyag
156a4('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa de la/ srid pa dmigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyib mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzha' chu
156a5('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ skye ba dmigs su yod dang / rga shi'i dra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
156a6('bum): mnyam pa dem/ rga shi rigs su yod dpa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi phyag dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mags pa dang mnyam sa
156a7('bum): des/ sbyin pa'i pha la tu myen pa rigs su mde dag / chug rdzi ma kyi ros tu myed pa gang bas kyis po khyag/ dpag rgyas/ gnal du bdab sa/ #
156b1('bum): ba dang mnyam pa de la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/
156b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal
156b3('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab
156b4('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam
156b5('bum): gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam
156b6('bum): gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab
156b7('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
157a1('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
157a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang
157a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
157a4('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
157a5('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid
157a6('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
157a7('bum): panyid gang bsas gyis mi khyang/ dpag tumed/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmig su yod dpa/ phogs dang ba mamed/
157b1('bum): bstong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzham du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ 'og ma dang ba ma med stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
157b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyag dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang
157b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chos
157b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
157b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
157b6('bum): su yod dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ mi migs pa stong pa nyi
157b7('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dngos po
158a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mngam
158a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyag dpag tu med/ gzhal du med
158a3('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dang
158a4('bum): tu med/ gzhas du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bas ma gyis
158a5('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ yang dag par spong ba dmigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang
158a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ dbang po
158a7('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dbang po rnams dmigs su yod dam/ stobs gang bsam
158b1('bum): gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ stobs rnams dmigs su yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsam gyis
158b2('bum): mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de lha/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam
158b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
158b4('bum): brgyad pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la//
158b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmisas su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
158b6('bum): de dag la/ bsam gtan rnams dmigs su yod dam/ tshad med pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
158b7('bum): mnyam pa de dag la/ tshad med pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med//
159a1('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
159a2('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ rnam par
159a3('bum): thar pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
159a4('bum): dang mnyam pa de dag la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
159a5('bum): smon pa med pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
159a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
159a7('bum): dang mnyam pa de dag la/ mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
159b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
159b2('bum): dang mnyam pa de dag la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med
159b3('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mi 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
159b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang
159b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/
159b6('bum): byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ byams pa chen po dmigs su yod dam/
159b7('bum): snying rje chen po gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ snying rje chen po dmig
160a1('bum): su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
160a2('bum): dang mnyam pa de dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/
160a3('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis mi khyab/
160a4('bum): dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam
160a5('bum): gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid
160a6('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang byang chub gang
160a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rang byang chub dmigs su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
160b1('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rnam pa
160b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs
160b3('bum): su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis chos thams
160b4('bum): cad bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam pa dang
160b5('bum): bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang
160b6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab// dpag tu med/
160b7('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ bsam gyis
161a1('bum): mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu med pa'o// tshad las yongs su 'das pas na/ gzhal
161a2('bum): du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las 'das pas na/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni//
161a3('bum): bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni/ dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gau zhal du
161a4('bum): med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ tshad med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig
161a5('bum): bla dgas so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
161a6('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu med ces bya ba ni nam mkha'
161a7('bum): dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam
161b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa/ mi mnyam
161b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am/ dpag par mi nus te/ de ltar na
161b3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du med do// de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
161b4('bum): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bston pa'i tshe/ dge slong
161b5('bum): lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las
161b6('bum): sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pa stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi
161b7('bum): mig rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba
162a1('bum): bskal pa 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162a2('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las// / le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la
162a3('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i
162a4('bum): slad du nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don
162a5('bum): dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan
162a6('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de
162a7('bum): bzhin no// de de bzhin to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
162b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162b2('bum): 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i
162b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir
162b4('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so// /
162b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus
162b6('bum): so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad
162b7('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so//
163a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
163a2('bum): bzhi 'dus so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so// stobs lnga 'dus so// byang
163a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan
163a4('bum): bzhi 'dus so// tshad med pa bzhi 'dus so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so// rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so// mthar
163a5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus so//
163a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
163a7('bum): 'dus so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so// snying rje chen po
163b1('bum): 'dus so// sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so//
163b2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang byang chub 'dus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams
163b3('bum): cad pa nyid 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur pa srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa'am/ yul gyi
163b4('bum): dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur
163b5('bum): bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang
163b6('bum): rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do// rab 'byor de bas na shes rab
163b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab po'i phyir nye bar gnas
164a1('bum): pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di ni/ bya ba
164a2('bum): gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
164a3('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor
164a4('bum): ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med
164a5('bum): par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa
164a6('bum): med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// /
164a7('bum): rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sngal yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nyebar
164b1('bum): gnas pa'o// lce la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags
164b2('bum): pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med
