209a1('bum): par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// me'i khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung
209a2('bum): bar mi bya'o// rlung gi khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// nam mkha'i khams la mngon par chags par
209a3('bum): mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
209a4('bum): ma rig pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// 'du byed la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung
209a5('bum): bar mi bya'o// rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags
209a6('bum): par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// skye mched drug la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// res
209a7('bum): ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar ma bya'o// tshor ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
209b1('bum): sred pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// len pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// srid
209b2('bum): pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// skye ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rga
209b3('bum): la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung ba
209b4('bum): mi bya'o// tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags
209b5('bum): par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// bsam
209b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs
209b7('bum): su gzung bar mi bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
209b8('bum): rlags par
210a1('bum): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// stong pa nyid stong /
210a2('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi
210a3('bum): bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
210a4('bum): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa
210a5('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs
210a6('bum): su gzung bar mi bya'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par
210a7('bum): chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// chos thams cad stong po nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
210b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
210b2('bum): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon
210b3('bum): par chags par mi bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
210b4('bum): la mngon byar chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
210b5('bum): yongasu gzung bar mi bya'o//
210b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa rnams la mngon par chags par 'a bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su
210b7('bum): gzung bar mi bya'o// stobs rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa
210b8('bum): mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon por chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
211a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags
211a2('bum): par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// gzugs med pa'i snyom
211a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs
211a4('bum): su gzung bar mi bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rnam par thar
211a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// mngon par
211a6('bum): shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su
211a7('bum): gzung bar mi bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul
211b1('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
211b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
211b3('bum): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'odres pa
211b4('bum): bco brgyad la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhags pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs
211b5('bum): su gzung bar mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i
211b6('bum): 'bras bu la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzug
211b7('bum): bar mi bya'o// rang byang chub la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la mngon por chags par mi bya'o//
212a1('bum): @yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//
212a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
212a3('bum): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
212a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mi brtag pa brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ zhi zhing
212a5('bum): phra ba la mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang / yid gsal bas 'tshal par bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma
212a6('bum): 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyis rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa
212a7('bum): dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
212b1('bum): kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /
212b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thams cad la ye shes dang / spong ba gang ji ste
212b3('bum): cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gdugs cig mos shing bsams te/ gzhal ba dang brtag pa dang / dpyad pa gnyis
212b4('bum): na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid ches legs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni
212b5('bum): 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes ji tsam pa dang spong ba gang ji snyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
212b6('bum): pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong glang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
212b7('bum): po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
213a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang /
213a2('bum): spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye
213a3('bum): shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji cas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so//
213a4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i
213a5('bum): bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
213a6('bum): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang
213a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod
213b1('bum): pa dang / gzugs yod pa na sprod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang
213b2('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su
213b3('bum): 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par
213b4('bum): 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i
213b5('bum): bzod par 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la/
213b6('bum): bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
213b7('bum): po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems
214a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /
214a2('bum): spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang
214a3('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lha'i bu
214a4('bum): dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyan cing / thos nas 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa
214a5('bum): dang kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni myur du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
214a6('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/ mdo sde gzhan la/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa dag ni ma yin no// de ci'i
214a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang /
214b1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub
214b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab
214b3('bum): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
214b4('bum): 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan
214b5('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis
214b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
214b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang
215a1('bum): pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ brgyad pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/
215a2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyir
215a3('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams byung gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing /
215a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag
215a5('bum): par rdzos pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar yang mi gda'o
215a6('bum): zhes nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
215a7('bum): la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste/ de dag shin tu yang mi ring ba zhig du phyin nas/ mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na
215b1('bum): spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do// gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
215b2('bum): rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me/
215b3('bum): 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing / gong du 'bri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid
215b4('bum): la bgyid na/ de gang nas shi bros te 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b5('bum): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing
215b6('bum): the tsom mi za nem nur mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos kyang
215b7('bum): yid la bya ba de dag dang mi 'bral la/ yid la bya ba de dag 'gro 'am 'ong ngam/ 'greng ngam 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jigs par
216a1('bum): mi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'breng ste/ rab 'byor dper na ba drus ma be'u mi 'dor ba
216a2('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don tu nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon tu ma byas/ dran
216a3('bum): bas 'dris par ma byas/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de mi gtong na/ rab 'byor byang chub
216a4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpe'i theg pa pa'i
216a5('bum): rigs kyi bu des/ sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang /
216a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to// gong du yang bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye
216a7('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to// bkur sti dang / bu dud dang / mchod pa byas par
216b1('bum): gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/ mi'i nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par
216b2('bum): gyur par blta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
216b3('bum): ma thag tu mos shing mos par gyur nas kyang 'bri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid cing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa las yon tan
216b4('bum): 'di dag nyid dang ldan shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de lta bu'i
216b5('bum): rnam grangs ma mchis sam ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
216b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las/ de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes de ni shes
216b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro// mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri'o// bris nas kyang lung 'bog go// kha ton byed do// tshul
217a1('bum): bzhin du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom
217a2('bum): ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so// thos nas kyang gzung ngo // bcangs so// yongs su bcangs so// klags so//
217a3('bum): kun chub par byas so// kha ton du byas so// tshul bzhin du yid la byas so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o//
217a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skal ba mnyam
217a5('bum): par skyes na yang / de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
217a6('bum): chen po des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' 'di yongs su 'dri ba dang / yongs su brtag pa
217a7('bum): byas pas/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o//

225b2('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ shes
225b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su
225b4('bum): ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam/
225b5('bum): gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'phogs par mi 'gyur te/ yongs su 'dri ba
225b6('bum): dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur to/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
225b7('bum): ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas/ rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyi dge ba'i bsam
226a1('bum): pa dang mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing /
226a2('bum): shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par
226a3('bum): rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o// rab
226a4('bum): 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha ton du ma byas la/ tshul bzhin du
226a5('bum): yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi
226a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs so// sbyin
226a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//
226b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
226b2('bum): ma bslabs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
226b3('bum): nyid la ma bslabs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
226b4('bum): ma bslabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslab so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
226b5('bum): ma bslabs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
226b6('bum): lam bslabs so// yang dag par spong rnam la ma bslabs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so// dbang po rnams la ma
226b7('bum): bslabs so// stobs rnams la mi bslabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
227a1('bum): brgyad pa la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so//
227a2('bum): tshad med pa rnams la ma bslabs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so//
227a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
227a4('bum): pa la ma bslabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so//
227a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslangs so// byams
227a6('bum): pa chen po la ma bslabs so// snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyun tu zhugs
227a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu las bslabs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lam bslobs so// dgra thetsam pa nyid
227b1('bum): la ma bslabs so// rang byang chub la ma bslabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes nyid la ma bslabs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so//
227b2('bum): rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa
227b3('bum): tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ lung 'bog pa 'am/ kha ton byed pa 'am/ tshul bzhin
227b4('bum): du yid la bya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi
227b5('bum): 'bri zhing / lung mi 'bog pa dang / kha ton mi byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
227b6('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bzod/
227b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la poni mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
228a1('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
228a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
228a3('bum): ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
228a4('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi
228a5('bum): 'dogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad
228a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
228a7('bum): pan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
228b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag
228b2('bum): par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi
228b3('bum): 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i
228b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan
228b5('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
228b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
228b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spod pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dog pa dang /
229a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan pan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin
229a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
229a3('bum): bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs
229a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir
229a5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phani mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan
229a6('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
229a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
229b1('bum): pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
229b2('bum): tu phyin pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi
229b3('bum): spod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ don dam
229b4('bum): paM stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ mtha' las
229b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi
229b6('bum): spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'bun
229b7('bum): por mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun
230a1('bum): par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'thun
230a2('bum): par mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang 'thun par mi spyad/
230a3('bum): stobs rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'thun par ma
230a4('bum): spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dang 'thun par mi spod//
230a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'thun par mi sprod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
230a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 'thun par mi spod/ mngon
230a7('bum): par shes pa rnams dang 'thun par mi skyo/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'thun par mi spyod/ de bzhin
230b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang 'thun par mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang 'thun par mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 'thun par mi spyod/
230b2('bum): snying rje chen po dang 'thun par mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par
230b3('bum): mi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'thun par
230b4('bum): mi sbed/ rang byang chub dang 'thun par mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'thun par mi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun
230b5('bum): bar mi spyod na/ de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
230b6('bum): kyi sa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
230b7('bum): 'di ma bris/ ma bstan/ kha ton du ma byas/ yid la ma byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang / pha rol la phan ma btags/
231a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang 'thun par
231a2('bum): spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis theg pa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par rig par
231a3('bum): bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum su sol pa'o//
231a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i dbu su gru zhig la mi rnams shing / shing dus 'am/ shing leb 'am/ rgyal ba 'am/ rol mi 'ju mi 'dzin na/ rab 'byor mi de
231a5('bum): dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma byin par dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam/ shing dum ngam/ shing
231a6('bum): leb bam/ rgyal ba 'am/ rol 'jug zhing 'dzin na/ de dag ni rgya mchod dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin pa
231a7('bum): 'gyur te/ mnyes mnyabs par thang la byin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bo zhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang bcam dang / dga' ba
231b1('bum): tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di mi 'dri ba mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan
231b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ chul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin
231b3('bum): du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi cad cing mi rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
231b4('bum): mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
231b5('bum): cing mi rten pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / byi stong pa nyid mi 'dre mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
231b6('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri ston/
231b7('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi stong / kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / don da
231b8('bum): ba stong pa nyid mi 'drimi ston/ kha ton du mi bye'o/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'drimi stod/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing
232a1('bum): mi rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston// kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
232a2('bum): mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa ston pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
232a3('bum): cing mi rten pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi
232a4('bum): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
232a5('bum): stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
232a6('bum): mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston// kha ton du
232a7('bum): mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dngos po med pi stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dran pa
232b1('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rted pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/
232b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dbang po rnams mi
232b3('bum): 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / stobs rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang /
232b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi 'dra mi ston/ kha
232b5('bum): ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi
232b6('bum): rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston//
233a1('bum): / kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi 'bri mi ston/
233a2('bum): ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing
233a3('bum): mi rten pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar
233a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mngon par
233a5('bum): shes pa rnams mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
233a6('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la cing mi rten pa dang /
233a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'bri mi ston/
233b1('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
233b2('bum): mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / byams pa chen po mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'bri mi ston/
233b3('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'bri mi ston/ kha tan du mi byed/ tshul
233b4('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi 'bri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / lam
233b5('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi 'bri mi ston// kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'bri mi ston/
233b6('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
233b7('bum): thob par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sang sa rgyas kyis mngon tu byed par 'gyur// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang
234a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don tu dad pa yod cing bzod pa dang / mos pa dang /
234a2('bum): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gtong ba yod cing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
234a3('bum): zab mo 'di 'bri'o// lung 'bog go// kha ton du byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// rten par byed do// de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am
234a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/
234a5('bum): dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ mi gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
234a6('bum): bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod
234a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
234b1('bum): su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
234b2('bum): ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
234b3('bum): su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las
234b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis
234b5('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang
234b6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis
234b7('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang
235a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas
235a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang
235a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongs su
235a4('bum): bzung ba dang / tshad med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa
235a5('bum): brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
235a6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis
235a7('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongasu bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa
235b1('bum): bzhis yongs su bzung dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung ba dang / snying rje chen
235b2('bum): pos yongasu bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / lam
235b3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba ba d+mor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas
235b4('bum): kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongasu smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
235b5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsreg shing / so ma btang bas/ chu bcu pa
235b6('bum): ses na/ rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/ myur tu 'gyes shing 'jig pa rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/
235b7('bum): de ni tha mar sa nyid 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sos dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang bla na med pa yA dag par rdzog pa'i byang
236a1('bum): @/ chub mngon par rdzog par 'chang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/
236a2('bum): spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba ya yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yA yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma bzung / thab mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam
236a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma bzung / tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyi
236a4('bum): pas yongasu ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'i stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa
236a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyi yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yong su ma bzang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yongasu ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yongasu ma bzung
236a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yongasu ma bzung thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yong su ma bzung / dor bamed pa stong pa nyid kyi yong su ma bzung rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi yong su ma 'thung / chos zang sna
236a7('bum): sa sum zugasas na sum ma byas sa zung mams su can bu ra chur lus na ma cang da kyis bus 'anas pa nang byang ma sa nas
236a8('bum): ma nas byu pad byas pas sus babyas dra ge bar gnag ma khyis 'ongs sum drug 'a dag pa rmo nas bya sa sum zung / rngu chul bye nga mang byab yum 'jus
236b1('bum): sa k+Sha /
236b2('bum): lta
236b3('bum): yongasus bzung / gsus kyis sgornams kyis yongs sum bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sobs bcus yongs sum brdung / mi 'jigs pa
236b4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /
236b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu
236b6('bum): bzung / rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung na byang chub sos dpa'i theg pa pi rig kyi bu'o/ rig kyi bu mo de dag ni bA ma dor nye zhor 'gyur ba shes pa bya'o// bam po bcug pa'o//
237a1('bum): // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyen thos
237a2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes pa'am bud med la la zhigabum pa so legs par btang bas/ chu klung ngam/
237a3('bum): mtsho 'am/ mche'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu chun/ rab 'byor chu chu ba'i bum pa des ni/ bde bar khyim du byin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
237a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod// bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i
237a5('bum): bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/ de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
237a6('bum): yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung
237a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid
237b1('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa
237b2('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzub
237b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
237b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mi dmigs pa
237b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
237b6('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang dag par spang bas yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung / dbang pos
237b7('bum): yongs su bzung / stobs kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags
238a1('bum): / pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung chad med pas yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
238a2('bum): 'jug pas yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i
238a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi
238a4('bum): sgos yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
238a5('bum): bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa
238a6('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
238a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te// mnyes mnyams par bla na med pa yang dag
238b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rabar 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i grum bsdams shing zag lhan ma byas par rdzas
238b2('bum): bcug ste/ chu la btang na/ rab 'byor gru de ni zhig par 'gyur te/ gru'ang logs shig rdzas kyang logs shig du song nas/ de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas
238b3('bum): pas gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rin po che chen po las yongs su phang bar rig par ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238b4('bum): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod// bzod pa'ang yod// mos pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod// spro ba'ang yod//
238b5('bum): lhag pa ni nges pa 'ang
238b6('bum): mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
238b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rob tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs sum bzung
238b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa

239b5('bum): ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs

240a1('bum): bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rab 'byor byang chub
240a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las
240a3('bum): 'bang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma dor nye blo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
240a4('bum): rgyas kyi sa'o// rang 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing / shin tu bstar ba tshul
240a5('bum): gtong zhing rdzas bcug na/ rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te/ gru des phyogs gang du 'grong pa der byin par 'gyur bar rig pa bya'o//

241a7('bum): pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyas kyis yongs su bzung
241b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su gsung / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi yongs su gzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor
241b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
241b3('bum): yang 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang
241b4('bum): yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yong / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de yang shes rab kyi
241b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 'gyur/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/ brtson 'grus
241b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin sas yongs su zin par gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/ sbyin
241b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs
242a1('bum): zin par gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zer par gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yongs su zin par gyur/ don dam pa stong
242a2('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ mtha' las 'angs
242a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par
242a4('bum): gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin
242a5('bum): par gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin
242a6('bum): par gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ yang dag par spong
242a7('bum): ba rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ dbang po rnams kyi yongs su zin par gyur/ stobs rnams kyis
242b1('bum): yongs su zin par gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su zin par gyur/ 'phags
242b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ chad med pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ gzugs med
242b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu
242b4('bum): yongs su zin par gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon med pas yongs su zin par gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs
242b5('bum): su zin par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
242b6('bum): yongs su zin par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su zin par gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su zin par gyur/ byams pa chen pos yongs su zi
242b7('bum): par gyur/ snying rje chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis
243a1('bum): yongs su zin par gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su zin dar
243a2('bum): gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byor ring lta ste dper na/ min chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu
243a3('bum): lon pa rgas pa dgog du gyur pa/ 'khogs pa zhig yod pa de'i lus la/ rlung ngam/ mkhris pa'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
243a4('bum): sems/ mi de gcig pu nyam rangs su khri las ldang nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags
243a5('bum): kyang / rgyang grags gcig gam/ rgyang grags gnyis su'ang mchi bar mi nus te/ de rgas pa dang bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas pa'i slad du khri las ldang nu su lags kyang
243a6('bum): mchi mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
243a7('bum): chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa 'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod / lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod / dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/
243b1('bum): brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yong mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi
243b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims
243b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis
243b4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
243b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzang/
243b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
243b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
244a1('bum): ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med
244a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma mazung /
244a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su mazung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs
244a4('bum): sum bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs
244a5('bum): su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs
244a6('bum): sum bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs
244a7('bum): su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs
244b1('bum): pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /
244b2('bum): snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa
244b3('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nya
244b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas
244b5('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i phar
244b6('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / nang stong
244b7('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
245a1('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
245a2('bum): ba dang / 'das byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
245a3('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
245a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs ma bzung ba dang / mi migs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu
245a5('bum): ma bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
245a6('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
245a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
245b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden
245b2('bum): bo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzug
245b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
245b4('bum): par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
245b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
245b6('bum): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par
245b7('bum): rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su mra bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
246a1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam/
246a2('bum): shes pa da kyis sangs sus bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mangs sum bzung ba'i phyir ra// rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper na/ mi
246a3('bum): kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khogs pa de nyid kyi lus la rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab
246a4('bum): par gyur la de khri las ltung bar 'dod la/ de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis blo g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/ brtan nas 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyong
246a5('bum): ci dga' ba'i don tu gar 'dod par 'dong ngo / khyod ni bdag cag gis gnas der ma byin gyi bar du/ lam du bar pa dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par
246a6('bum): mi 'gyur ro// zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
246a7('bum): phyir dad pa'ang yod / bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod // lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod// dga' ba'ang yod/ spo ba 'ang yod/
246b1('bum): mi gtong ba'ang yod// brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas
246b2('bum): yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol
246b3('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid
246b4('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / bye stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
246b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus
246b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid
246b7('bum): kyim yongs su bzung / dang ba mod pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyis yongs su bzang / chos pas
247a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mi dmigs pa
247a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
247a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs
247a4('bum): su bzung / rdzu 'bral gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub
247a5('bum): kye yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam
247a6('bum): gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par
247a7('bum): thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med
247b1('bum): ba dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
247b2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
247b3('bum): yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
247b4('bum): brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
247b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
247b6('bum): bar mdor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
248a1('bum): byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i
248a2('bum): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/
248a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
248a4('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
248a5('bum): pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgo
248a6('bum): ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa na/ de yang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis she
248a7('bum): rab bsgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // mad
248b1('bum): ni sbyin pa byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o//
248b2('bum): bzod pa ni 'di bsgom mo// bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan
248b3('bum): pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// bsam gtan ni 'di la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni
248b4('bum): shes rab bsgom pa'o// shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su
248b5('bum): byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang
248b6('bum): ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/
248b7('bum): de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan
249a1('bum): rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab
249a2('bum): rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
249a3('bum): phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog po de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni
249a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus
249a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring
249a6('bum): du song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de lta
249a7('bum): yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpo'i theg pa pa de ring du song ba 'ang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul
249b1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
249b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa
249b3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
249b4('bum): bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
249b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
249b6('bum): su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong
249b7('bum): su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
250a1('bum): @dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
250a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
250a3('bum): stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs
250a4('bum): su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su
250a5('bum): ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pargyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas
250a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /
250a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de
250b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
250b2('bum): ma bzung / byams pachen pos yongs sum bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs sum bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yang/
250b3('bum): sum bzung // thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad ma/
250b4('bum): ba nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor
250b5('bum): de ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpe'i theg pa pa thog mar
250b6('bum): thabs med par sbyin pa gtong / thabs med par tshul khrims srung / thabs med par bzod pa bsgom/ thabs med par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs
250b7('bum): med par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs med par shes rab sgom zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
251a1('bum): sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo // 'di ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di
251a2('bum): srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di bsgom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni bsam
251a3('bum): gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni shes rab bsgom mo// shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo zhes/ de sbyin pa
251a4('bum): rlob sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyi
251a5('bum): rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag
251a6('bum): ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang
251a7('bum): ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom
251b1('bum): sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste/ de cin
251b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
251b3('bum): tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar na de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir na
251b4('bum): nade ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar na de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod
251b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam
251b6('bum): par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
251b7('bum): phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe
252a1('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam
252a2('bum): par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa
252a3('bum): med pa'o// de lta yin yang byang chub sems pa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba'ang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
252a4('bum): bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
252a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid
252a6('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
252a7('bum): su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bcung
252b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
252b2('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong
252b3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa
252b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye
252b5('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
252b6('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan
252b7('bum): lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa
253a1('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis
253a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smom
253a3('bum): ba med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
253a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
253a5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
253a6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
