368a5('bum): ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge
368a6('bum): 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor bya
368a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungab kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu med
368b1('bum): la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
368b2('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la
368b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
368b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems
368b5('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
368b6('bum): ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i
368b7('bum): go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
369a1('bum): byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po'ang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med
369a2('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/
369a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po'ang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
369a4('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
369a5('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
369a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
369a7('bum): 'ang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
369b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la
369b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
369b3('bum): bo'i go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go
369b4('bum): cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
369b5('bum): ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir
369b6('bum): go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin
369b7('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
370a1('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
370a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang
370a3('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
370a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad
370a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang
370a6('bum): dag gis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin
370a7('bum): no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal pa
370b1('bum): des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//
370b2('bum): zhes go cha 'chal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas skabs ma mchis te don
370b3('bum): gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa 'tshams bcad de sems can gyi don tu go cha 'tshal pa ma lags so//
370b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha
370b5('bum): bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras
370b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'chal pa ma lags/ ye shes nyung
370b7('bum): zad zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad
371a1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thas
371a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub seMs
371a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe'i don tu go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang
371a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgoso// /
371a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang
371a6('bum): du'ang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi
371a7('bum): ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de
371b1('bum): ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
371b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
371b3('bum): pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsgom pa rnam par
371b4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa gang skam pa de gang bsgom pa rnam
371b5('bum): par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
371b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
371b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnam pa 'di ni
372a1('bum): 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
372a2('bum): rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam pa
372a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
372a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
372a5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa
372a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
372a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
372b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
372b2('bum): ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
372b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
372b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
372b5('bum): ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par
372b6('bum): shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa
372b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// /
373a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
373a2('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
373a3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
373a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
373a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/
373a6('bum): ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg
373a7('bum): ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam pa
373b1('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom rnam par
373b2('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par
373b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par
373b4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam pa
373b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
373b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
373b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
374a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
374a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
374a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na na
374a4('bum): par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom
374a5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
374a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis
374a7('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
374a8('bum): dzis te/ ses kyis kyi co 'i ni mam 'i 'argos pa rnam par ma pa/
374b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
374b2('bum): reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
374b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
374b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
374b5('bum): srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
374b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
374b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni seMs
375a1('bum): can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog
375a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
375a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
375a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
375a5('bum): ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par
375a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
375a7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po thesgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
375b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
375b2('bum): 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam
375b3('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par/
375b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
375b5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
375b6('bum): sta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
375b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
376a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
376a2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa
376a3('bum): nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
376a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
376a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
376a6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bskob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgos pa 'di ni 'dus
376a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'don 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
376b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa
376b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
376b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
376b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
376b5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
376b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
376b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos
377a1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
377a2('bum): pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med gi
377a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
377a4('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam pa
377a5('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
377a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
377a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
377b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam
377b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom
377b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
377b4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
377b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
377b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
377b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
378a1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
378a2('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
378a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
378a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
378a5('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs
378a6('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par
378a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
378b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
378b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
378b3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
378b4('bum): pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir
378b5('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa
378b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
378b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
379a1('bum): @#ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
379a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs pa
379a3('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
379a4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
379a5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa
379a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
379a7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
379b1('bum): ni rna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'asgos pa 'di ni lde bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'i
379b2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
379b3('bum): 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
379b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
379b5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
379b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
379b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ca
380a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa
380a2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
380a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
380a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam
380a5('bum): par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
380a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
380a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
380b1('bum): 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgo
380b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
380b3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
380b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
380b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
380b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
380b7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
381a1('bum): pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
381a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams
381a3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
381a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
381a5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i
381a6('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ra
381a7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
381b1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ming dang gzugs
381b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
381b3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
381b4('bum): pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
381b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
381b6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
381b7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni na shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
382a1('bum): 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can
382a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab bya
382a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
382a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam
382a5('bum): bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
382a6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
382a7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam
382b1('bum): bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
382b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
382b3('bum): ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam pa ba
382b4('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
382b5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
382b6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
382b7('bum): ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes
383a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang
383a2('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
383a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
383a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
383a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa
383a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
383a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
383b1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
383b2('bum): thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brnam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'das ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa rnam pa nini da ba med pa gang ba nyid
383b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
383b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
383b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
383b6('bum): pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa
383b7('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskas pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa/
384a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
384a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
384a3('bum): sta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
384a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po
384a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
384a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
384a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsku
384b1('bum): pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam
384b2('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
384b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
384b4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i
384b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
384b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / slor ba med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 'di ni mngon par shes pa
384b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
385a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
385a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
385a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sos
385a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam
385a5('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
385a6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
385a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan
385b1('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
385b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
385b3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
385b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
385b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
385b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes
385b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa
386a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub
386a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
386a3('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
386a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems
386a5('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa
386a6('bum): med dam zhes/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
386a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems
386b1('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes nang stong pa
386b2('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon
386b3('bum): par chags med dam zhes/ phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
386b4('bum): chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
386b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
386b6('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chen po stong pa nyid la
386b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
387a1('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
387a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
387a3('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam na/
387a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha'
387a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag
387a6('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thog ma dang tha ma med
387a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa
387b1('bum): nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
387b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
387b3('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chos thams
387b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid
387b5('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
387b6('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa
387b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam
388a1('bum): zhes/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
388a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga za nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par tshogs pa med dam zhes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
388a3('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med du ma
388a4('bum): zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sos
388a5('bum): dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
388a6('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ yang dag
388a7('bum): bar spang ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul
388b1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
388b2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dpe zhes/ dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
388b3('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stobs
388b4('bum): rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag
388b5('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
388b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
388b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon
389a1('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
389a2('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan rnams la
389a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par
389a4('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
389a5('bum): dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub
389a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par
389a7('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
389b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
389b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
389b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
389b4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
389b5('bum): chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
389b6('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la
389b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon
390a1('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
390a2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la
390a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa
390a4('bum): med dam zhes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
390a5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
390a6('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
390a7('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa'
390b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med
390b2('bum): dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
390b3('bum): chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
390b4('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
390b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon
390b6('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
390b7('bum): bam po bcwo brgyad pa'o// // phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
391a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por
391a2('bum): mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi
391a3('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma
391a4('bum): yin nam zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
391a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur dam/ tshul khrims
391a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta mau/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/
391a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi
391b1('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa
391b2('bum): dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' la thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang
391b3('bum): la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan tu byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
391b4('bum): ni sngon gi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su bris shing yongs su brtag par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs pa ste/ kun chub par byas
391b5('bum): pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
391b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mau dang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir
391b7('bum): mi ldog la zos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byas te tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
392a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag
392a2('bum): par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab
392a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
392a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
392a5('bum): ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang
392a6('bum): mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
392a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
392b1('bum): chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
392b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b5('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub seMs
392b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
392b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
393a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mi 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
393a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab
393a3('bum): 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od la rtog pa yin//
393a4('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin//
393a5('bum): rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
393a6('bum): la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
393a7('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
393b1('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
393b2('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
393b3('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
393b4('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
393b5('bum): rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yi no// gsol pa
393b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
393b7('bum): bar 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par gyur/
394a1('bum): smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis
394a2('bum): rtog par 'gyur/ na mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
394a3('bum): skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa
394a4('bum): ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun
394a5('bum): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
394a6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
394a7('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
394b1('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
394b2('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
394b3('bum): 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
394b4('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
394b5('bum): mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
394b6('bum): par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur//
394b7('bum): sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smig rgyu la gzho
395a1('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la
395a2('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
395a3('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
395a4('bum): dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes
395a5('bum): ba la rtog pa lags sam/ mig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa
395a6('bum): lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ rol rtog pa lags sam/
395a7('bum): reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i
395b1('bum): rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la
395b2('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/
395b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te
395b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
395b5('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid
395b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ si'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa
395b7('bum): lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig
396a1('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs la rtog pa
396a2('bum): lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len pa la rtog/
396a3('bum): ba lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/
396a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags
396a5('bum): sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
396a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa
396a7('bum): lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
396b1('bum): sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la
396b2('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
396b3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa stong nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa
396b4('bum): lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye ba gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
396b5('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang
396b6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa
396b7('bum): lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
397a1('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
397a2('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lag
397a3('bum): sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags
397a4('bum): sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags
397a5('bum): sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags
397a6('bum): sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
397a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma
397b1('bum): yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog
397b2('bum): pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// sgra la rtog pa ma yin no//
397b3('bum): dri la rtog pa ma yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//
397b4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam
397b5('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus
397b6('bum): te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la
397b7('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa la ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te
398a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus
398a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
398a3('bum): gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//
398a4('bum): rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa ma
398a5('bum): yon no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin
398a6('bum): no// reg pa la rtog pa yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no// len pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye
398a7('bum): ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin
398b1('bum): no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa
398b2('bum): ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid
398b3('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus
398b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang
398b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad
398b6('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong
398b7('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag
399a1('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dpa
399a2('bum): po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
399a3('bum): pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//
399a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
399a5('bum): rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa
399a6('bum): ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//
399a7('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// snying rje chen po sa/
399b1('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog
399b2('bum): pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de
399b3('bum): ni sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa
399b4('bum): ste de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang man
399b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te gzugs kyi ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no//
399b6('bum): mig gis ma yin no// rnabs ma yin no// snas ma yin no// ldes ma yin no/ lus kyis ma yin na// yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin no// smras ma/
399b7('bum): yin no// dris ma yin no// ros ma yin no// reg gis ma yin no// chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma
400a1('bum): yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// yid
400a2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te
400a3('bum): reg pas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no//
400a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin
400a5('bum): no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sa'i khams kyis ma yin no//
400a6('bum): khams kyis ma yin no// me'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis
400a7('bum): ma yin no// ma rig pas ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no// skye mched drug gis ma yin no//
400b1('bum): reg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// sred pas ma yin no// len pas ma yin no// srid pas ma yin no// skye bas ma yin no// rga shis ma yin no// sbyin
400b2('bum): pa'i pha rol rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
400b3('bum): byin pas ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi stong pa
400b4('bum): nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
400b5('bum): ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//
400b6('bum): thog ma dang ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad
400b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
401a1('bum): kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa zhes
401a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no//
401a3('bum): stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
401a4('bum): kyis ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
401a5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
401a6('bum): pa dang smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no// gzungs kyis mya yin no// de bzhin
401a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no// sa mo yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no// byams pa chen
401b1('bum): pos ma yin no// snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan
401b2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin ni// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam
401b3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
401b4('bum): do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
401b5('bum): nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
401b6('bum): pa nyid do// sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// /
401b7('bum): yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// /
402a1('bum): byadri nyid kyang rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
402a2('bum): nyid do// chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid
402a3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad man/
402a4('bum): pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi
402a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam
402a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
402a7('bum): pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
402b1('bum): pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa
402b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
