402b3('bum): ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sa'i khams kyang
402b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
402b5('bum): rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams
402b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
402b7('bum): do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid
403a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa
403a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srid pa nyid kyang
403a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
403a4('bum): tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
403a5('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
403a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
403a7('bum): pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam
403b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
403b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa
403b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa
403b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang
403b5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rna
403b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
403b7('bum): pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi
404a1('bum): rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stobs nyid kyang rnam pa
404a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
404a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// tshad med pa
404a4('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam
404a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
404a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid
404a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
404b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byams
404b2('bum): pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang
404b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
404b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
404b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// /
404b6('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
404b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
405a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa snyed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
405a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

405a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa ma
405a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
405b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
405b2('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gas/
405b3('bum): ba'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi rnam par
405b4('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
405b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin

406b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

407a1('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang

407b8('bum): zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/

408b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de

409a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong
409b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa
409b2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
409b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
409b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang d+ma dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag
409b5('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par
409b6('bum): ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
409b7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
410a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi
410a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhi
410a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa'i de
410a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de
410a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
410a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
410a7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin
410b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ga
410b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i
410b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
410b4('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
410b5('bum): gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
410b6('bum): gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
410b7('bum): pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
411a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
411a2('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
411a3('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
411a4('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
411a5('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
411a6('bum): ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
411a7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu brgyad pa'o// /
411b1('bum): bam po bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na
411b2('bum): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams sgra rdzas kyi can dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka mang po dag
411b3('bum): khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
411b4('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis
411b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
411b6('bum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
411b7('bum): gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
412a1('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
412a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/
412a3('bum): mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
412a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad
412a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang luso//
412a6('bum): yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa zas
412a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad
412b1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid
412b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
412b3('bum): nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//
412b4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid ni
412b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
412b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/
412b7('bum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi
413a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
413a2('bum): te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te
413a3('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
413a4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te bya'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
413a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi
413a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
413a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i
413b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
413b2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
413b3('bum): kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
413b4('bum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
413b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i
413b6('bum): khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
413b7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi
414a1('bum): khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid
414a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
414a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa
414a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dadeng gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
414a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid
414a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
414a7('bum): kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
414b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa tham
414b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang masher// sbyin
414b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
414b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
414b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
414b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
414b7('bum): kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
415a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong
415a2('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
415a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid//
415a4('bum): chen pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
415a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus
415a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las
415a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
415b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
415b2('bum): ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
415b3('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad sto
415b4('bum): pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs
415b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
415b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa zas
415b7('bum): cad mkhyen kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos
416a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
416a2('bum): nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spang ba
416a3('bum): rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam
416a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
416a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
416a6('bum): mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pam
416a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid
416b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
416b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
416b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa
416b4('bum): rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom
416b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
416b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
416b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// /
417a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin ga
417a2('bum): pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam
417a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
417a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
417a5('bum): pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas
417a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// gzugs kyi
417a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
417b1('bum): byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
417b2('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
417b3('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang
417b4('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
417b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
417b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// / sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
417b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sde'i de bzhin nyid gang
417b8('bum): rna 'a'i de bzhin ga zhi ba ba rnam pad ma khyen pa'idi kyi pa ni nidi 'ang yin 'de ni bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ pa med cing bzhis bur med de/
418a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
418a2('bum): su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
418a3('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
418a4('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
418a5('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin glang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig sa
418a6('bum): ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
418a7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
418b1('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de//

418b5('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
418b6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
418b7('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
419a1('bum): gang yin pa don de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung medang// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid pa

419a4('bum): su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa

422b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga

424a6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/

424b7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

425a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
425a6('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
425a7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
425b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
425b2('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi 'jigs pa
425b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya
425b4('bum): med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
425b5('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
425b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
425b7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
426a1('bum): / gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
426a2('bum): gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'id bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa da na da bzhin nyang
426a3('bum): gcag pa ste/ gnyis su med cang gnyis su byar mad// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
426a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
426a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
426a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
426a7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
426b1('bum): gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
426b2('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
426b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
426b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid
426b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong
426b6('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhini nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
426b7('bum): dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing ga
427a1('bum): su byar med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
427a2('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
427a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
427a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs
427a5('bum): pa rnams kyi byang chub/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing ba lta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags
427a6('bum): pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pa rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
427a7('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag
427b1('bum): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
427b2('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
427b3('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//
427b4('bum): mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
427b5('bum): kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad
427b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam
427b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzug so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad
428a1('bum): mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
428a2('bum): dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
428a3('bum): kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
428a4('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
428a5('bum): kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes so// lce'i rnam par
428a6('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
428a7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thas
428b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig
428b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
428b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa
428b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te rega'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa
428b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
428b6('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig
428b7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
429a1('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
429a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
429a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
429a4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams
429a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
429a6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
429a7('bum): chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mo'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam
429b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
429b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
429b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam
429b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
429b5('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//
429b6('bum): mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
429b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srid pa nyid
430a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
430a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa
430a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
430a4('bum): rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims
430a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
430a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
430a7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
430b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
430b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//
430b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
430b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa
430b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam
430b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
430b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
431a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
431a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med
431a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
431a4('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
431a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
431a6('bum): nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa
431a7('bum): nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
431b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rngaza nyid stong ba nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de/
431b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/
431b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams//
431b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
431b5('bum): ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnam so//
431b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
431b7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams
432a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams
432a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
432a3('bum): pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
432a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa
432a5('bum): rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
432a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang /
432a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
432b1('bum): kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi
432b2('bum): sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad
432b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
432b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag
432b5('bum): par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa
432b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
432b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
433a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
433a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
433a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams so// dgra bcom pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dgra bcom
433a4('bum): pa rnams so// rang byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang byang chub rnams so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
433a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa rnams so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
433a6('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las// / bam po nyi shu pa'o// // gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
433a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
433b1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do// 'du shes kyi /
433b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
433b3('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya
433b4('bum): med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
433b5('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
433b6('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
433b7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
434a1('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
434a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
434a3('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yod kyi de bzhin
434a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
434a5('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
434a6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
434a7('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid ga

434b2('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin

434b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

442a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
442a2('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
442a3('bum): byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
442a4('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ni
442a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
442a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang
442a7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lam
442b1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
442b2('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
442b3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
442b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin
442b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
442b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
442b7('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ban
443a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
443a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi de
443a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su myed
443a4('bum): do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma
443a5('bum): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing lta dka' la khong du chud par dka'
443a6('bum): zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtog par rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches pa
443a7('bum): dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun
443b1('bum): nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
443b2('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
443b3('bum): dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
443b4('bum): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med par zab pa'i phyir
443b5('bum): chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
443b6('bum): zab po// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdag zab
443b7('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
444a1('bum): dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i dag skyes bu
444a2('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag
444a3('bum): shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
444a4('bum): lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos
444a5('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i
444a6('bum): phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba
444a7('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus zab
444b1('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sgra zag
444b2('bum): ba'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir
444b3('bum): chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i
444b4('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sde'i rnam par shes pa
444b5('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos
444b6('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob po// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
444b7('bum): lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus kyi
445a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
445a2('bum): lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir
445a3('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
445a4('bum): tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'du
445a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa'i phyi
445a6('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag me'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag na mkha'i
445a7('bum): khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di/
445b1('bum): zab po// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag ming dang gzugs
445b2('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag
445b3('bum): tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu
445b4('bum): dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag
445b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag bzod pa
445b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gtan
445b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid
446a1('bum): @zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
446a2('bum): chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag don
446a3('bum): dab pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab
446a4('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
446a5('bum): ba'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zad
446a6('bum): bo d+hal+la'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
446a7('bum): ngag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dngos po med pa'i
446b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag par spong bzag
446b2('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dbang po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
446b3('bum): dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
446b4('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
446b5('bum): lha'i bu dag tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par
446b6('bum): thar pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa'i
446b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
447a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin/
447a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag so so yang dag par rig pa zab
447a3('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po//
447a4('bum): lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i
447a5('bum): bu dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag
447a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rang byang chub zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab
447a7('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
447b1('bum): 'jig rten thams cad yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs bzung
447b2('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du shes
447b3('bum): bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du byed bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam
447b4('bum): par shes pa bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mi lags/ mig bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
447b5('bum): lags/ rna ba bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
447b6('bum): lce bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid
447b7('bum): bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
448a1('bum): sgra bzung ba'i slad du ma lagasami bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dri bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du
